txt.en: When inspiring your Blade-brother, the rest of the fellowship also gains a small boon.
Your Inspire (Blade-brother) and To Arms (Blade-brother) apply 20% of their benefit to your Fellowship.
Your Inspire (Blade-brother) and To Arms (Blade-brother) apply 40% of their benefit to your Fellowship.
Your Inspire (Blade-brother) and To Arms (Blade-brother) apply 60% of their benefit to your Fellowship.
